patthana16.45:1.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.45:2.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
